description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级领导人。曾任中共第十八届中央政治局委员、国务院副总理、国务院金融稳定发展委员会主任等职。
description.en: A political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former deputy national leader. He served as a member of the 18th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Director of the State Council Financial Stability and Development Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，马凯担任中央政治局委员时的最高领导人。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the paramount leader when Ma Kai served as a member of the Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理，曾是马凯的上级，并提名其为国务院副总理。
description.en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, formerly Ma Kai's superior, who nominated him for Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理，马凯在担任国家发改委主任、国务委员及国务院秘书长期间的上级。
description.en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, Ma Kai's superior while he served as Director of the NDRC, State Councilor, and Secretary-General of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主席，曾任命马凯为国家发改委主任。
description.en: President of the People's Republic of China, who appointed Ma Kai as the Director of the NDRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替马凯担任国务院副总理和国务院金融稳定发展委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who succeeded Ma Kai as Vice Premier of the State Council and Director of the State Council Financial Stability and Development Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，马凯的前任国务院秘书长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, Ma Kai's predecessor as Secretary-General of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替马凯担任国务院秘书长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who succeeded Ma Kai as Secretary-General of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，其原国家发展计划委员会主任的职务由马凯在新组建的国家发改委中接任。
description.en: A Chinese political figure whose position as Director of the State Development Planning Commission was succeeded by Ma Kai in the newly formed NDRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替马凯担任国家发改委主任。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who succeeded Ma Kai as Director of the NDRC.

description.zh-cn: 马凯的父亲，原名马本初，八路军高级干部。
description.en: Ma Kai's father, original name Ma Benchu, a senior cadre of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 马凯的妻子。
description.en: Ma Kai's wife.

description.zh-cn: 马凯的女儿。
description.en: Ma Kai's daughter.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一场政治运动，期间马凯曾参与红卫兵活动，后受冲击被下放劳动。
description.en: A political movement in China, during which Ma Kai participated in Red Guard activities and was later impacted and sent to labor.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名高等学府，马凯在此获得经济学硕士学位。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education in Beijing, China, where Ma Kai obtained his Master's degree in Economics.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名中学，马凯曾在此就读和任教。
description.en: A famous high school in Beijing, China, where Ma Kai studied and later taught.

nodes.id: 首都红卫兵纠察队西城分队

zh-cn: 首都红卫兵纠察队西城分队
en: Western District Picket Team of the Capital's Red Guards

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期的一个红卫兵组织，马凯曾参与其活动。
description.en: A Red Guard organization during the early Cultural Revolution, in which Ma Kai participated.

description.zh-cn: 马凯的出生地。
description.en: Ma Kai's birthplace.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一，马凯曾担任其委员。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China, where Ma Kai served as a member.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
en: Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的高级领导职务，马凯曾担任此职。
description.en: A high-level leadership position in the State Council of the People's Republic of China, previously held by Ma Kai.

nodes.id: 国务院金融稳定发展委员会

zh-cn: 国务院金融稳定发展委员会
en: State Council Financial Stability and Development Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国国务院下设的金融监管协调机构，马凯曾担任首任主任。
description.en: A financial regulatory and coordination body under the State Council of China, with Ma Kai as its inaugural director.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成人员之一，属于国家级副职领导人，马凯曾担任此职。
description.en: A member of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, a deputy national leader position previously held by Ma Kai.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院秘书长

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院秘书长
en: Secretary-General of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的领导成员之一，协助总理处理国务院日常工作，马凯曾担任此职。
description.en: A leading member of the State Council of the People's Republic of China who assists the Premier in handling the daily work of the State Council, a position previously held by Ma Kai.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会
国家发展和改革委员会
en: National Development and Reform Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国国务院的宏观经济调控部门，马凯曾担任其主任。
description.en: The macroeconomic regulation department of the State Council of China, where Ma Kai served as director.

description.zh-cn: 培训中国中高级公务员的机构，马凯曾担任其院长。
description.en: An institution for training middle and senior civil servants in China, where Ma Kai served as president.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会第一次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会第一次全体会议
en: First Plenary Session of the 18th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 在此次会议上，马凯当选为中央政治局委员。
description.en: At this meeting, Ma Kai was elected as a member of the Politburo.

en: First Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the CPC

description.zh-cn: 在此次会议后，马凯卸任中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: After this meeting, Ma Kai stepped down as a member of the CPC Central Politburo.

nodes.id: 十三届全国人大一次会议

zh-cn: 十三届全国人大一次会议
en: First Session of the 13th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 在此次会议后，马凯卸任国务院副总理并退休。
description.en: After this meeting, Ma Kai stepped down as Vice Premier of the State Council and retired.

description.zh-cn: 马凯毕业于中国人民大学政治经济学系政治经济学专业。
description.en: Ma Kai graduated from the Department of Political Economy, specializing in Political Economy, at Renmin University of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任总书记期间，马凯任中央政治局委员。
description.en: Ma Kai served as a member of the Politburo while Xi Jinping was the General Secretary.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在李克强担任总理期间，马凯任国务院副总理。
description.en: Ma Kai served as Vice Premier of the State Council during Li Keqiang's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 国务院总理李克强提名为马凯为国务院副总理。
description.en: Premier Li Keqiang nominated Ma Kai as Vice Premier of the State Council.

position.zh-cn: 国家发改委主任、国务委员兼国务院秘书长
position.en: Director of the NDRC, State Councilor and Secretary-General of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝担任总理期间，马凯先后担任国家发改委主任、国务委员和国务院秘书长。
description.en: During Wen Jiabao's premiership, Ma Kai successively served as Director of the NDRC, State Councilor, and Secretary-General of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 国家主席胡锦涛发布主席令，任命马凯为国家发改委主任。
description.en: President Hu Jintao issued a presidential order appointing Ma Kai as the Director of the NDRC.

relationships.target: 国务院金融稳定发展委员会

description.zh-cn: 刘鹤接替马凯出任国务院金融稳定发展委员会主任及国务院副总理。
description.en: Liu He succeeded Ma Kai as Director of the State Council Financial Stability and Development Committee and as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 马凯接替华建敏出任国务院秘书长。
description.en: Ma Kai succeeded Hua Jianmin as Secretary-General of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 杨晶接替马凯出任国务院秘书长。
description.en: Yang Jing succeeded Ma Kai as Secretary-General of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 马凯接替曾培炎（原国家发展计划委员会主任）的职务，出任新组建的国家发展和改革委员会主任。
description.en: Ma Kai succeeded Zeng Peiyan (former Director of the State Development Planning Commission) to become the director of the newly formed National Development and Reform Commission.

description.zh-cn: 张平接替马凯出任国家发展和改革委员会主任。
description.en: Zhang Ping succeeded Ma Kai as Director of the National Development and Reform Commission.

description.zh-cn: 马凯在文化大革命期间受冲击，被下放到五七干校劳动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Ma Kai was impacted and sent to a May Seventh Cadre School to perform manual labor.

relationships.target: 首都红卫兵纠察队西城分队

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期曾参与该红卫兵组织的活动。
description.en: Participated in the activities of this Red Guard organization during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会第一次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在中共十八届一中全会上，马凯当选为中央政治局委员，进入中共中央领导核心。
description.en: At the First Plenary Session of the 18th CPC Central Committee, Ma Kai was elected as a member of the Politburo, entering the core leadership of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中共十九届一中全会后，71岁的马凯卸任中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: After the First Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee, 71-year-old Ma Kai stepped down as a member of the CPC Central Politburo.

relationships.source: 十三届全国人大一次会议

description.zh-cn: 十三届全国人大一次会议后，马凯卸任国务院副总理一职后退休。
description.en: After the First Session of the 13th National People's Congress, Ma Kai retired after stepping down from his post as Vice Premier of the State Council.
